set_locale: Set the default language for the system.
set_output_language: Set the default language for your output generations.
update_name: Update your first and last name.
update_email: Update the email address on your account.
your_plan_description: View, upgrade, change or cancel your plan.
pay_as_your_go_description: Generate content on demand with no upfront commitment, and pay only for what you use.
pre_invoice_description: Update your billing information as well as view and download your invoices.
lifetime_plan_description: Lifetime plans gie you access to a certain number of credits every month forever without having to pay on a monthly basis.
set_default_Industry: Analyzing millions of campaign headlines with AI, this score predicts how engaging your generated copy will be for your audience.
